login.title: Please enter your login data
login.mailerror: Please enter a valid email address.

errorAlert.title: An error has occurred
errorAlert.subTitle: Ops. There was something wrong. Half as bad. The best way is to reload the window again.

invite.title: Invite friend
invite.message: Here you can invite friends. Just enter the email address of your buddy.
invite.alertSubTitle: We've sent an invitation to the address (%email%) you specified.

signup.title: Create a new Account
signup.message: Enter an Email address and choose a Password.
signup.alertSubTitle: Your Account was created successfully. You can now log in.

forgetPassword.title: Forgot your password?
forgetPassword.message: Please give us your email address. We will send you a new one.
forgetPassword.alertSubTitle: Look in your mailbox, you have mail from us! If not, you have perhaps misspelled the email address or you have no account at all.

changePassword.title: Password change
changePassword.message: You can change your password here. However, your old password is required.
changePassword.alertSubTitle: Your password has been successfully changed.

tiles.noContent: No Content available! Please check your Settings!
